programme.title: NYC's new immigrants
programme.short_synopsis: New immigrants to New York City in 1990 and the languages they speak.
programme.medium_synopsis: Today's immigrants to New York and why they don't speak English, and the invitation to black players to join the Augusta National golf club in 1990.
